Title: Title: Noodle Lunch Bowl
Ingredients: Ingredients: - 1/2 pound noodles - 2 carrots, peeled and chopped - 2 cups shredded cabbage - 2 cloves garlic, minced
Instructions: Instructions: 1. In a large pot, bring 6-8 cups of water to a boil. 2. Once boiling, add the noodles and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. 3. Add the carrots to the pot and cook for 3 minutes. 4. 2 minutes before the noodles are finished, add the cabbage and garlic. 5. Drain the noodles after 10 minutes, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Preparation

Title: Title: Steak with Carrots and Mushrooms
Ingredients: Ingredients: - Steak - Carrots - Mushrooms - Onion - Olive Oil
Instructions: Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425��F. 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3. Cut the steak into cubes and season lightly with salt and pepper. 4. Add steak to the skillet and cook until golden brown. 5. Remove steak from the skillet and set aside. 6. Cut the carrots, mushrooms, and onion into pieces. 7. Add the vegetables to the skillet and cook, stirring often, until lightly browned and tender, about 10 minutes. 8. Add steak back to the skillet and stir until heated through. 9. Transfer the steak and vegetables to a baking dish and bake until the steak is cooked to desired doneness, about 15 minutes. Preparation
